# Peer Assessment 1

## Loading and preprocessing the data

```{r include=FALSE}
require(lubridate)
require(dplyr)
```
```{r load_date}
require(lubridate)
require(dplyr)
activity <- read.csv('activity.csv')
activity$date <- ymd(activity$date)
```

## What is mean total number of steps taken per day?

```{r steps_per_day}
by_day <- group_by(activity,date)
steps <- summarize(by_day,sum(steps))
colnames(steps) <- c('date','sum.steps')
plot(steps,
     main='Steps per Day',xlab='Date (2012)',ylab='Number of Steps')
```
